title: Idle Bank Tycoon
description:
In my role as a Junior Unity Developer at Kolibri Games, this is the first major successful game I contributed to. Working on this project provided me with valuable insights into mobile game development and platform-specific challenges. I was involved with third-party SDKs, participated in technical planning, implemented features, and collaborated closely with colleagues to create polished, high-quality gameplay systems.

  • Technical planning and system architecture
  • Implementation of core features
  • Integration of third-party SDKs
  • Year: 2023–Current
  • Platform: Android/iOS
  • Engine: Unity
